name: Cocchi and Soda
description: You can adjust this drink to your taste—the Classico cocktail calls for equal parts Cocchi Americano and soda, though we like it with less.
recipeIngredient: Splash chilled club soda (up to 1 ounce if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add Cocchi and stir twice to chill, add soda. Rub orange twist on rim of glass, then add to drink as garnish.
